last_episode_to_air.name: Jimmy Ron Cricket
last_episode_to_air.overview: Pig goes on a tour of the Picklemart. Banana finds his old ranger friend. Cricket's brother escapes from prison. Goat's idol pays her a visit.

episodes.name: Pig Goat Banana Cricket High Five!
episodes.overview: Pig befriends shopping cart. Goat searches for audience to hear her new song. Banana's job is in jeopardy. Cricket's beauty goo almost destroys the world.

episodes.name: Fudgepocalypse
episodes.overview: Pig's love for fudge bubbles triggers a fudge deluge of doom; Goat uses her ark to save the town from rising fudge waters; Banana is taken by pirates; Cricket rebuilds his life.

episodes.name: Super Space Meatball
episodes.overview: A space meatball gives the friends super powers; Goat battles the town villain; Pig stops the Time Donut from stealing; Cricket is upset when he does not get a super power; Banana is persuaded to join the villains.

episodes.name: The Chronicles of Cutesachusetts
episodes.overview: Pig cleans the toilet and is sucked into another world; Goat struggles to fix a hole in the roof; Banana is lazy; Cricket creates a powerful vacuum.

episodes.name: Prank Thy Neighbor
episodes.overview: The gang gets new neighbors, the Hamshanks! Banana vows to prank them away. Goat becomes infected and slowly turns into a Hamshank. Pig falls in love the youngest Hamshank. Cricket searches to cure Goat.

episodes.name: Miss Cutesy Meow Meows
episodes.overview: Pig gets an undercover mission at the Picklemart; Banana buys a new friend; Goat must rush to make an audition for her new movie; Cricket has to protect his secret toy collection.

episodes.name: Let's Get Tiny
episodes.overview: Pig wants to help a whale with his blowhole. Goat sides with some misfit paintings after being accused of stealing from a museum. Cricket helps a team of bacteria cheerleaders. Banana plots to get his old boss back.

episodes.name: The Most Beautiful Roach in the World
episodes.overview: Pig finds a police kit in a cereal box. Goat submits a cockroach for a beauty pageant. Banana gets trapped in a factory that wants to use his peel. Cricket has to go back to kindergarten to get a diploma.

episodes.name: The Tooth of My True Love
episodes.overview: Goat is saved by a masked hero and believes he's her one true love. Pig becomes a musical chairs champion. Banana is mistaken for a Tubey Dude, a popular kid's toy. Cricket must go back to kindergarten.

episodes.name: Gauntlet of Humiliation
episodes.overview: Pig finds a police kit in a cereal box; Goat enters a cockroach into a beauty pageant; Banana gets trapped in a factory; Cricket is forced to return to kindergarten.

episodes.name: DJ Wheelbarrow Full of Nachos
episodes.overview: Pig finds a police kit in a cereal box; Goat enters a cockroach into a beauty pageant; Banana gets trapped in a factory; Cricket is forced to return to kindergarten.

episodes.name: Underpants-Palooza
episodes.overview: Pig's parents are in town visiting the gang. Goat becomes the subject of her own reality show. Cricket uses science to become more appealing to Goat. Banana uses a legendary monster to scare his Junior Rangers.

episodes.name: Bananaland
episodes.overview: Banana builds his own theme park. Cricket needs to hire a new lab assistant. Goat joins a band of country bears, or so she thinks. Pig is tasked with taking care of the house while the roommates are away.

episodes.name: Zombie Broheims
episodes.overview: Banana makes Pig his substitute Scoutmaster for the day. Banana joins a herd of zombies. Goat wants to be Customer of the Day at the Smoothie shop. Cricket awaits the best cookie in the world from being ready in his lab.

episodes.name: Happy Chalawunga!
episodes.overview: Pig searches the sewers for Filthy the Foot. Banana is forced to shop for Chalawunga gifts. Goat is determined to sing her song in the Chalawunga Parade. Cricket creates Mecha Foot for Pig.

episodes.name: Mall Ya Later
episodes.overview: A mall gets built around the treehouse. Banana needs to make a quick buck to buy his toy gun. Goat operates a wizarding kiosk. Cricket gets stuck managing a Jorts store. Pig goes to the movies with disastrous results.

episodes.name: Total Bananarchy
episodes.overview: Pig wishes to the President for his birthday, but causes mayhem. Banana recruits Shragger as his bodyguard. Goat builds a sculpture for Pig's birthday. Cricket flees to Mars for a more organized society.

episodes.name: Angry Old Raisin
episodes.overview: Pig wreaks havoc at his elderly neighbor's house. Goat accidentally sends a bad email to the President. Banana has to perform in his Forest Ranger talent show. Cricket wants to impress Dr. Eggplant Face.

episodes.name: Cow Duck Avocado Mantis
episodes.overview: Pig wants to be a famous belt in an action movie. Goat is discovered by a movie director. Banana has to replace his hero on a hit television show. Cricket thinks he can make a movie all by himself.

episodes.name: It's Time to Slumber Party
episodes.overview: Nobody wants to play with Pig; Goat joins the force; Banana does news casting; Cricket picks his nose and tries to stop it.

episodes.name: Secret Origins: Special Edition
episodes.overview: We reveal how the four friends meet and how they become roommates.

episodes.name: Moby Woof
episodes.overview: Pig competes to become the next Picklemart mascot; Banana asks the sun to go away so he can sleep; Cricket visits each of his friends' dreams to ask them for a gift; Goat meets the world's biggest dog at the circus, and he steals her horn.

episodes.name: Prince Mermeow Moves In!
episodes.overview: Prince Mermeow moves into the treehouse and tries to get each of the gang member's bedrooms.

episodes.name: The Mud Munchkins Must Be Crazy
episodes.overview: Pig needs to find a place where his shopping cart family is accepted; Cricket needs to go to the bathroom in a clean environment; Goat loses her thermos to the Mud Munchkins; Banana makes real life imitate video games.

episodes.name: Gold Rush
episodes.overview: Banana searches for gold with his friends; Pig uses dancing shoes on a dancing date; Goat struggles to cross a busy street; Cricket loses his butt after turning it into gold.

episodes.name: King of TV
episodes.overview: Pig and Angry Old Raisin try to get back the TV remote; Goat has to cross a road toll; Banana befriends a train full of hobos; Cricket takes his new robot out to dinner before using her to obtain the remote.

episodes.name: Road Trippin'
episodes.overview: On a road trip to go see the Pretty Panda at the zoo, Goat stops at a concert, Pig stops at a trampoline theme park. Banana has to do jail time and Cricket has to get him back.

episodes.name: Heat Wave
episodes.overview: Pig wants to have a pool party; Goat gets confused for a secret agent; Banana beats the heat by stealing an ice cream truck; Cricket gets trapped in a cave.

episodes.name: Charm School
episodes.overview: Pig needs to learn some manners; Goat wants to protect her favorite city landmark; Banana becomes a world-famous stuntman; Cricket wants to get Pig back to his old ways.

episodes.name: The Goofy Turkey Zone
episodes.overview: Cricket goes back in time to date Goat; Goat wishes to be a great musician; Banana needs to win a video game competition; Pig possesses Angry Old Raisin's scooter.

episodes.name: The Ding-A-Ling Circus
episodes.overview: The gang helps save a failing circus; Goat beautifies the oddities; Banana rigs the midway; Pig starts a flea circus; Cricket trains the animals.

episodes.name: Steak Bus
episodes.overview: Pig directs a commercial for the Picklemart; Banana attempts to eat the perfect steak; Cricket needs to get his super suit dry cleaned; Goat is recruited to be a famous wrestler.

episodes.name: Witness Protection Program
episodes.overview: The gang must go in disguise to hide from a dangerous criminal: Pig as a professor, Goat as a businesswoman, Banana as a plumber, and Cricket as a baby.

episodes.name: Flowers for Burgerstein
episodes.overview: Banana reunites with his musical family; Pig takes Angry Old Raisin to a dog show; Goat falls in love with a repair man; Cricket makes Burgerstein smart.

episodes.name: Hotel It on the Mountain
episodes.overview: The roommates open a hotel; Pig is the bellboy, Goat is the chef, Banana is the hotel manager and Cricket is the maid.

episodes.name: Where Do Pickles Come From?
episodes.overview: Goat wants to build a new entertainment center; Cricket wants to impress Goat by being a vigilante; Banana becomes an Internet celebrity; Pig finds out where pickles come from.

episodes.name: Hospital Time
episodes.overview: The gang want to get to the hospital to eat the world's best mashed potatoes; Banana plays a betting game; Pig does a surgery with Angry Old Raisin; Goat fixes Tony Towel; Cricket makes himself sick.

episodes.name: Love Boat
episodes.overview: The gang takes a cruise vacation. Cricket shows off his discount ticket; Pig wants more room in his body to eat pickles; Banana plays matchmaker; Goat has to cover for her mistake.

episodes.name: It's On Like Con Con
episodes.overview: At Convention Con, Pig's movie is debuting. Banana finds a way to make money on comics. Cricket wants an elusive toy. Goat seeks help to win the costume contest.

guest_stars.character: Professor Huh? / Octopus King of the Nerds (voice)
guest_stars.name: Rob Paulsen

episodes.name: Jimmy Ron Cricket
episodes.overview: Pig goes on a tour of the Picklemart. Banana finds his old ranger friend. Cricket's brother escapes from prison. Goat's idol pays her a visit.
